settings.text: International Customers: Note that you may be charged duties & taxes upon delivery.

settings.title: Truly Unscented
settings.content: A clean, natural moisturiser with no overpowering scent.

settings.title: Deep Hydration
settings.content: Locks in moisture for soft, smooth, and radiant skin.

settings.title: Single-Ingredient Purity
settings.content: Made from 100% grass-fed beef tallow, free of additives.

settings.ctm_description: Made from 100% grass-fed and grass-finished beef Tallow. This single ingredient, unscented moisturizer deeply nourishes the skin barrier, to protect, smooth, and hydrate. Leaving your skin soft, and radiant.
settings.cta_bottom_text_2: Free standard shipping on all US orders over $70.

settings.title: Dispense
settings.content: Pump or scoop a pea-sized amount of Super Tallow™ into your hands. Our unique bottle design gives you the freedom to choose your preferred application method.

settings.title: Apply
settings.content: Warm Super Tallow™ in your hands to activate its silky texture, then massage onto clean, dry skin.

settings.title: Glow
settings.content: Allow the Super Tallow™ to fully absorb, leaving your skin deeply nourished, soft and naturally radiant

settings.review: I’ve always been wary of conventional skin care products due to their long list of unrecognizable ingredients. I feel very fortunate to have found this product. Thank you for bringing it to market!
settings.name: Michelle M.

settings.review: Omg my dull, dry, and broken out skin from fertility meds is so happy now. I barely have to wear makeup and someone thought I was 19 and SHOCKED when I mentioned my age and that I was married and a mom. I am a customer for life!
settings.name: Brittany N.

settings.review: Amazing customer service and even better product. Skin has never been better and I don't have to worry about harmful chemicals.
settings.name: Lee K.

settings.title: Written in Radiance
settings.content: See how Super Tallow™ is redefining skincare, one glowing transformation at a time.

settings.title: Nutrient Rich
settings.content: Packed with vitamins A, D, E and K for a healthy glow.

settings.title: Gentle on All Skin
settings.content: Perfect for sensitive, dry, or combination skin.

settings.title: Deep Hydration
settings.content: Locks in moisture for soft, supple skin.

settings.question: What is Beef Tallow?
settings.answer: Beef tallow is a nutrient rich pure fat, rendered from cows. It is naturally abundant in vitamins A, D, E, and K, and deeply nourishes and protects the skin. With a lipid profile nearly identical to human skin, beef tallow absorbs effortlessly, making it one of the most effective, natural moisturizers on Earth.

settings.question: When should I use Super Tallow™?
settings.answer: Any time your skin feels like it needs nourishment. Fit Super Tallow™ into your daily/nightly routine however works best for you.

settings.question: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer: Yes we do, although, our International customers are personally responsible for any duties, taxes, or fees required by their country outside of the United States.

settings.question: Does Super Tallow™ cause breakouts?
settings.answer: Every skin type is unique, but our Super Tallow™ is non-comedogenic, and we've found that most users experience no issues with clogged pores.

settings.question: Is Super Tallow™ Pregnancy/Baby Safe?
settings.answer: Yes! Super Tallow™ is safe to use during pregnancy, breastfeeding, and on your baby.

settings.question: How do I replace my Super Tallow™ refill cartridge?
settings.answer: Step 1: Twist off the pump lid of your original bottle. Step 2: Locate the two tabs on the current cartridge in your bottle. Gently squeeze these tabs as you pull the cartridge up. Step 3: Remove the cap and foil seal on your new refill cartridge. Step 4: Line up the two tabs on the refill cartridge with the two notches on the bottle. Step 5: IMPORTANT! Be sure to snap the refill cartridge down into the bottle. you should hear and feel a "click". If the cartridge is not properly seated into the bottle, it may become dislodged when twisting off the lid. Step 6: Twist the lid back onto the bottle and you're good to go!

settings.question: Is your packaging recyclable?
settings.answer: Yes. Our mailer boxes are fully recyclable and eco-friendly, and our Super Tallow™ bottles and refill cartridges are made from Eco-friendly, 30% Post-Consumer Recycled Material. Our bottles and cartridges are designed to be recyclable. However, recycling capabilities can differ by location. We recommend checking your local recycling guidelines to ensure proper disposal.

settings.question: Does your Super Tallow™ have a smell?
settings.answer: Unlike other Tallow brands, Our Super Tallow™ is completely unscented. We specialize in a proprietary rendering process that gently removes the scent, while maintaining the original nutrient profile.

settings.question: Where can I get support?
settings.answer: We take pride in delivering outstanding customer care. Reach us at: support@claeskin.com Monday-Friday. We are here for you.

settings.question: What makes Super Tallow™ Super?
settings.answer: Super Tallow™ is 100% USA-sourced from small family owned farms, with cattle that are entirely grass-fed and grass-finished. We are third-party lab tested over 30 times to ensure unmatched purity, and it's guaranteed pesticide/glyphosate free.We never dilute with cheap seed oils, and our proprietary rendering process creates a completely unscented product that stays luxuriously smooth. Packaged in high-end, refillable, and sustainable bottles with the option to pump or scoop. Super Tallow™ delivers natural skincare that truly stands apart.

settings.question: How should I store my Super Tallow™?
settings.answer: Super Tallow™ is shelf-stable at room temperature, but because we do not add stabilizers, it's sensitive to heat and cold. Store between 70-76F for optimal consistency. If your Super Tallow™ becomes too firm or too soft, the pump may not dispense properly. In this case, we recommend twisting off the lid and using the scoop method. Use your Super Tallow™ within 6 months of opening.

settings.question: How much Super Tallow™ should I use?
settings.answer: A little goes a long way! We recommend starting with a pea-sized amount.

settings.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
settings.answer: Please email us at: support@claeskin.com and we will be happy to assist you.
